name: 4casesdan
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w2, w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w2, wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w2, w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w2, wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w2, w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w2, wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w2, wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, wn(w3))), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, wn(w3))), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w2), w3), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wn(w2), w3)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, wn(w3))), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wn(w2), w3)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(w2, wn(w3))), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wn(w2), w3)), w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w1)

comment: Deduction eliminating two antecedents from the four possible cases that result from their true/false combinations. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2013.)
